channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @KevinCTofel I have an Alexa in every room of my house. I think we crossed that line a long long time ago. ;-)
item.source:markdown: @KevinCTofel I have an Alexa in every room of my house. I think we crossed that line a long long time ago. ;-)

item.description:
@ByteForByte I don't find it when I searched for it. what do you search for?

Also when I open this link on my Pixel 6 Pro, it says "Your device isn't compatible with this application."
item.source:markdown:
@ByteForByte I don't find it when I searched for it. what do you search for?
Also when I open this link on my Pixel 6 Pro, it says "Your device isn't compatible with this application."

item.description:
1/6 Today was the first time I went to a Tesla supercharger.

2/6 I thought I could make it home with 6% to spare, but my Tesla insisted that I should play it safe and get a charge at the charger in New Paltz, NY.

3/6 Turns out it was at a place I knew well, the Plaza Diner. When I was 17 I hitchhiked up to New Paltz every Friday and often would end up there on my way.

4/6 I was amazed at how fast their charger runs. It almost felt like filling up a gas-powered car.

5/6 I was also impressed that there was NOWHERE TO PISS. How can you have a place like this with no way for a human to evacuate while the car fills up.

6/6 I was very tempted to just do it, but I held on and waited till I got home.
item.source:markdown:
1/6 Today was the first time I went to a Tesla supercharger.
2/6 I thought I could make it home with 6% to spare, but my Tesla insisted that I should play it safe and get a charge at the charger in New Paltz, NY.
3/6 Turns out it was at a place I knew well, the Plaza Diner. When I was 17 I hitchhiked up to New Paltz every Friday and often would end up there on my way.
4/6 I was amazed at how fast their charger runs. It almost felt like filling up a gas-powered car.
5/6 I was also impressed that there was NOWHERE TO PISS. How can you have a place like this with no way for a human to evacuate while the car fills up.
6/6 I was very tempted to just do it, but I held on and waited till I got home.

item.description:
I went down to NYC to see the Mets, eat hot Chinese food, check out the old neighborhood and get bagels.

I also had a infinite number of opportunities to get a Covid infection.

This morning I was going down in a hotel elevator when a family of 5 got on. No masks. ðŸ˜³

item.description: @gwthompson did you get a new non-apple watch?
item.source:markdown: @gwthompson did you get a new non-apple watch?

item.description:
I'm trying using an Android phone exclusively to see what I give up. Apparently quite a lot.

First question -- I have an Apple Watch. I assume there's no way to use it with an Android phone?

Second -- I subscribe to Apple TV+. There doesn't seem to be an app for Android?
item.source:markdown:
I'm trying using an Android phone exclusively to see what I give up. Apparently quite a lot.
First question -- I have an Apple Watch. I assume there's no way to use it with an Android phone?
Second -- I subscribe to Apple TV+. There doesn't seem to be an app for Android?

item.description:
I think Twitter, in its post-Musk hangover, can rise and be a much stronger company than they've ever been.

Twitter as a company, imho, has never had the chance to focus.

Their future as a platform, if they grow it the right way, is enormous.

PS: I bought a small amount of TWTR stock a few years back and continue to hold it. I have no plans to sell. Here for the duration.
item.source:markdown:
I think Twitter, in its post-Musk hangover, can rise and be a much stronger company than they've ever been.
Twitter as a company, imho, has never had the chance to focus.
Their future as a platform, if they grow it the right way, is enormous.
PS: I bought a small amount of TWTR stock a few years back and continue to hold it. I have no plans to sell. Here for the duration.

item.description:
This is good politics. Sure she'll lose some Alitoist Republican voters that she never had anyway.

Make DeSantis eat this. It's his breakfast, lunch and dinner all the way through November. https://t.co/HaFQysmCC9

Get Marco Rubio to declare on abortion too.

That's a Senate seat we can steal.

Get Marco Rubio to declare on abortion too.
That's a Senate seat we can steal.

item.description:
Today I coined a new term -- News Products.

A product made out of news.

I keep looking for something better, but in this case needed a descriptive term.
item.source:markdown:
Today I coined a new term -- News Products.
A product made out of news.
I keep looking for something better, but in this case needed a descriptive term.

item.description:
@dweinberger Even better -- use the benefit in the name --

PowerVoting

It gives you more power. It does. It delivers.

@dweinberger But I agree -- when I hear Ranked Choice Voting my eyes glaze over, and I think I must've missed that day in math class.

item.description:
If you use Google Drive, how do you backup what's in the cloud on a local computer?

I downloaded and installed the desktop version of Google Drive, and now it's downloading everything right now. That's what I wanted. Wish I had some control over when it did the download. Oh well. :-)

I had to kill the Google Drive process because it was downloading stuff where Dropbox could see it and DB was uploading it to their server.
item.source:markdown:
If you use Google Drive, how do you backup what's in the cloud on a local computer?
I downloaded and installed the desktop version of Google Drive, and now it's downloading everything right now. That's what I wanted. Wish I had some control over when it did the download. Oh well. :-)
I had to kill the Google Drive process because it was downloading stuff where Dropbox could see it and DB was uploading it to their server.
